entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
